1.title: Plant-Based By Nafsika S01 E01. Dr. Deepa Verma
1.plot: In the very first episode of Season 1, Nafsika interviews Dr. Deepa Verma and discusses Integrative Medicine.

2.title: S01 E02. Judie Mancuso, Simone Reyes, Katie Cleary, Jane Velez-Mitchell & Donna Dennison, Clifton Roberts
2.plot: Jane Velez-Mitchell and Donna Dennison (That Snarky Vegan Girl) show Nafsika how to make a Super Sexy, Super Food Salad. Who knew a salad could be so sexy?

3.title: S01 E05 Tom Cangemi, Adrienne Borgerson, Chris Pert
3.plot: Think a plant-based diet is full of boring foods? Maybe a bunch of 'weak' hungry people moping around? Plant-Based, by Nafsika is going to change the entire perspective. Guests:Tom Cangemi, Adrienne Borgerson, Chris Pert.

4.title: S01 E03. Demetrius Bagley, Chef Jay Astafa, Nick Ignazzi
4.plot: Have you thought about going vegan but immediately panicked at the thought of missing cheese? Not to fear. Chef Jay Astafa shows Nafsika how to make vegan mozzarella.

5.title: S01 E04. Victoria Moran, Chef Guy Vaknin, Adrienne Borgerson
5.plot: Adrienne Borgersen, Editor in Chief of La Fashionista Compassionista Online Magazine talks to Nafsika about her favorite cruelty-free cosmetics, showing us that there is no need to sacrifice your beauty when you're vegan.

6.title: S01 E06 · John Lewis, Jane Velez-Mitchell & Donna Dennison, Ken Spector
6.plot: Wish cookies could be nutritious? They are when they're badass. Watch Nafsika's interview with John Lewis of Badass Power Cookie.

imdb.plot outline: Nafsika Antypas is a Greece-trained "olive oil expert" who promotes the health benefits of a plant-based nutritional plan. She believes, however, that veganism isn't a diet; it's simply a way of life. To that end, she hosts a series that's about living a healthy yet fun lifestyle. The half-hour episodes engage viewers with cooking demonstrations, interviews with doctors and nutritionists, and guests from the worlds of entertainment and fashion. Antypas hopes to show that omitting animal products from one's diet and lifestyle is a positive thing to do, both in terms of personal health and for the sustainability of the planet.
imdb.title: Plant Based by Nafsika
plot: Nafsika Antypas is a Greece-trained "olive oil expert" who promotes the health benefits of a plant-based nutritional plan. She believes, however, that veganism isn't a diet; it's simply a way of life. To that end, she hosts a series that's about living a healthy yet fun lifestyle. The half-hour episodes engage viewers with cooking demonstrations, interviews with doctors and nutritionists, and guests from the worlds of entertainment and fashion. Antypas hopes to show that omitting animal products from one's diet and lifestyle is a positive thing to do, both in terms of personal health and for the sustainability of the planet.::Wikipedia
